news_items.headline: The 2026 ESPN Fantasy Baseball draft guide: Rankings, tips, stats, strategy and more
news_items.description: All the rankings, projections, cheat sheets, strategy and analysis you need for the 2026 fantasy baseball season.

news_items.headline: Tools of the trade: Nuances to exploit in ESPN's fantasy baseball game
news_items.description: Tristan H. Cockcroft gives newcomers tips on how to best use the tools available to them in ESPN's fantasy baseball game.

news_items.headline: 2026 WBC: How Team USA built its best pitching staff ever
news_items.description: Three years after an epic end to the World Baseball Classic, American stars are pitching in like never before.

news_items.headline: Phillies looking to move OF Nick Castellanos
news_items.description: The Phillies are looking to trade outfielder Nick Castellanos ahead of their first full-squad workout of spring training. Meanwhile, ace Zack Wheeler seems unlikely to be ready for Opening Day as he recovers from blood clot surgery.

news_items.headline: MLB to produce local broadcasts for Tigers, NHL's Red Wings
news_items.description: The Detroit Tigers will have their local television broadcasts produced and distributed by Major League Baseball this season. The deal also includes the NHL's Red Wings. Both the Tigers and Wings are owned by Ilitch Sports + Entertainment.

news_items.headline: Astros LHP Josh Hader working way back from shoulder injury
news_items.description: The Astros hope to learn more later this week about the health of All-Star closer Josh Hader, who is continuing to recover from a shoulder injury suffered in August.
